--- title: Activity Diagram - ZKP Tooling Comparison config: theme: base --- %% UML Activity (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream) for ZKP tooling comparison workflow. stateDiagram-v2 state "Define ZKP requirements
(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)" as Define state "Shortlist ZKP libraries" as Shortlist state "Evaluate integration fit
(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)" as Fit state "Run benchmarks
(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)" as Bench state "Select candidate for PoC" as Select state "Reject or defer candidate" as Reject state "Document decision and risks" as Document [IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream] --> Define Define --> Shortlist Shortlist --> Fit: fits platform constraints Shortlist --> Reject: lacks required support Fit --> Bench Bench --> Select: meets PoC targets Bench --> Shortlist: fails targets Reject --> Shortlist Select --> Document Document --> [IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
